channel.title: Client Compiler Issues (Cannot find symbol)
channel.description:
Hello, I am trying to add a server favorites list in my client (Webber's Client) Here are the errors that I can't figure out how to fix: [code]Gui.java:800: cannot find symbol symbol : class FileReader location: class Gui BufferedReader r = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("Se rvers.txt")); ^ Gui.java:814: cannot find symbol symbol : class BufferedWriter location: class Gui BufferedWriter w = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("Se rvers.txt")); ^ Gui.java:814: cannot find symbol symbol : class BufferedWriter location: class Gui BufferedWriter w = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("Se rvers.txt")); ^ Gui.java:814: cannot find symbol symbol : class FileWriter location: class Gui BufferedWriter w = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("Se rvers.txt")); ^ Gui.java:826: cannot find symbol symbol : class BufferedWriter location: class Gui BufferedWriter bw = null; ^ Gui.java:829: cannot find symbol symbol : class BufferedWriter location: class Gui bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("Servers.txt", tr ue)); ^ Gui.java:829: cannot find symbol symbol : class FileWriter location: class Gui bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("Servers.txt", tr ue)); ^ Gui.java:863: cannot find symbol symbol : class FileReader location: class Gui servrs = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./" + file)) ; ^ Gui.java:864: cannot find symbol symbol : class FileNotFoundException location: class Gui } catch (FileNotFoundException fileex) { ^ Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 9 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
If anyone has a clue on how to fix these errors please reply! The errors are FileReader, BufferedReader, BufferedWriter, FileWriter, and FileNotFoundException. Yes, I have gotten this from another client. In the other client I have searched for those 4 errors both in Client.java and BottGui.java. What do I need to add in order to make this work? Thanks! ~_James_Scape

item.title: Client Compiler Issues (Cannot find symbol)
item.dc:creator: @_James_scape _James_scape
item.description:
@_James_scape wrote:

Thanks man! I just copy and pasted the import stuff to my gui and deleted the duplicates. Compiles perfect! Thanks!

Read full topic

item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

For one thing, you should be looking in GUI.java

location: class Gui

item.title: Client Compiler Issues (Cannot find symbol)
item.dc:creator: @_James_scape _James_scape
item.description:
@_James_scape wrote:

Hello, I am trying to add a server favorites list in my client (Webber’s Client)
Here are the errors that I can’t figure out how to fix:

Gui.java:800: cannot find symbol symbol : class FileReader location: class Gui BufferedReader r = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("Se rvers.txt")); ^ Gui.java:814: cannot find symbol symbol : class BufferedWriter location: class Gui BufferedWriter w = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("Se rvers.txt")); ^ Gui.java:814: cannot find symbol symbol : class BufferedWriter location: class Gui BufferedWriter w = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("Se rvers.txt")); ^ Gui.java:814: cannot find symbol symbol : class FileWriter location: class Gui BufferedWriter w = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("Se rvers.txt")); ^ Gui.java:826: cannot find symbol symbol : class BufferedWriter location: class Gui BufferedWriter bw = null; ^ Gui.java:829: cannot find symbol symbol : class BufferedWriter location: class Gui bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("Servers.txt", tr ue)); ^ Gui.java:829: cannot find symbol symbol : class FileWriter location: class Gui bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("Servers.txt", tr ue)); ^ Gui.java:863: cannot find symbol symbol : class FileReader location: class Gui servrs = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./" + file)) ; ^ Gui.java:864: cannot find symbol symbol : class FileNotFoundException location: class Gui } catch (FileNotFoundException fileex) { ^ Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 9 errors Press any key to continue . . .

If anyone has a clue on how to fix these errors please reply!
The errors are FileReader, BufferedReader, BufferedWriter, FileWriter, and FileNotFoundException.
Yes, I have gotten this from another client. In the other client I have searched for those 4 errors both in Client.java and BottGui.java. What do I need to add in order to make this work?
Thanks!
~_James_Scape
